snippet: As Senator Ted Cruz looks beyond Wisconsin, where he is favored to win on Tuesday, his frustrations with the Ohio governor have increasingly been laid bare.
abstract: Sen Ted Cruz, frustrated by Ohio Gov John R Kasich's refusal to drop out of Republican presidential race, launches attack ads against him; Cruz's team argues that Kasich's bid will only help their rival Donald J Trump in states to come.

byline.original: By MATT FLEGENHEIMER and JONATHAN MARTIN
byline.contributor: Matt Flegenheimer reported from Madison, and Jonathan Martin from Washington. Trip Gabriel contributed reporting from New York, and Thomas Kaplan from Cohoes, N.Y.

lead_paragraph: As Senator Ted Cruz looks beyond Wisconsin, where he is favored to win on Tuesday, his frustrations with the Ohio governor have increasingly been laid bare.

headline.main: Ted Cruz Is Fuming Because John Kasich Won’t Bow Out
headline.print_headline: Cruz Is Fuming Because Kasich Won’t Bow Out
